summary.para: Specifies how a video stream is interlaced.
In the descriptions that follow, upper field refers to the field that contains the leading half scan line. Lower field refers to the field that contains the first full scan line.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_Unknown
member.summary: The type of interlacing is not known.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_FieldInterleavedUpperFirst
member.summary: Interlaced frames. Each frame contains two fields. The field lines are interleaved, with the upper field appearing on the first line.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_FieldInterleavedLowerFirst
member.summary: Interlaced frames. Each frame contains two fields. The field lines are interleaved, with the lower field appearing on the first line.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_FieldSingleUpper
member.summary: Interlaced frames. Each frame contains one field, with the upper field appearing first.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_FieldSingleLower
member.summary: Interlaced frames. Each frame contains one field, with the lower field appearing first.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_MixedInterlaceOrProgressive
member.summary: The stream contains a mix of interlaced and progressive modes.

member.name: MFVideoInterlaceMode.MFVideoInterlace_ForceDWORD
member.summary: Reserved. This member forces the enumeration type to compile as a DWORD value.
